skillTree.localised_description: Very rare and virtually extinct, even in Lustria, the Horned One's preternatural swiftness puts it way ahead of other Cold Ones.

effects.description:
Passive Ability: "Unrelenting Hunters", while this Mount is equipped, for Cold One rider units
	(all units in army)

Passive Ability: "Unrelenting Hunters" for Cold One rider units
	(all units in army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Unique and terrifying flying reptiles that are just as much a danger to their riders as the enemy!

skillTree.localised_description: Amongst the largest and most ferocious of their race, the eldest Stegadons have thicker hide and larger horns than others of their kind.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison
Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee. This attribute also adds a  +50% damage multiplier against buildings.
This unit can fire while on the move.

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.
Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: It's not just for decoration, you know!
The Lizardmen’s habitat and eco-system shall be guarded against attack from without… and below!
So deft and agile is this one, they’ve almost reached Saurus levels of battle prowess.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 10% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Lustria’s temple-cities contain many fine structures dedicated to the Old Ones that stand in service of the Great Plan.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -15% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: If you know the way, almost any beast can be tamed and set to one’s will.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -20% for Cold One, Ripperdactyl and Terradon Riders units
	(Lord's army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Cold One, Ripperdactyl and Terradon Riders units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15 for Cold One, Ripperdactyl and Terradon Riders units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: With the correct leadership, the Lizardmen’s traditional workers and artisans can be trained to fight effectively.

Leadership: +4 for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +7% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Chameleon Stalker units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Skinks spawned from the same pool are connected, strengthening and supporting each other in battle by their presence.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +10 for Lords and embedded Heroes
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +10 for Lords and embedded Heroes
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Of course, those who live to kill must also kill to live...
The Plan *will* be observed, even if every member of the younger races has to die to achieve the Old Ones' goals.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A long-serving member of an ancient, honourable tradition.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.
Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +250 metres without incurring any time penalty
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +600 metres without incurring any time penalty
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +1000 metres without incurring any time penalty

skillTree.localised_description: The power generated by the overarching Geomantic Web can also be used to nourish the Saurus on the march.
This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.
Life in the jungle means knowing the difference between which flora can heal and what, if ingested, will kill you.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(Lord's army)

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-important and opinionated, this one's hubris knows no end.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can block projectiles regardless of its facing.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-effacing and unpresuming, he believes that we all have a part to play in the Great Plan, one way or another.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "What are you even for? You're not part of the Great Plan, like all your kind."
"The Plan is the Plan. We shall not deviate or retreat from its path."

effects.description:
Construction cost: -15% for Advanced Military Recruitment buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +15%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +500 metres without incurring any time penalty
